name: Runa's School Story
description: Point and click adventure game full of mini-games. Help the ghost of the school to find peace.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 10 or later Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: any
